title: Which of the Motorola smartphones have a longer battery life and faster processor? - Quora

response.answer_text: Motorola, nokia and black berry are the 3 phone companies you AVOID. They dont innovate and are lazy companies now. They still stick to their 20 year old designs. Theyre all jokes by todays standards, who in 2020 in their right mind will use a blaclberry key note? A 3310? A motorola razr? Stick with Apple, Samsung and some of the other chinese brands like oneplus. I wouldnt go for google either.
